title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: This board has problems when external Display is hooked up to Thunderbolt port. Internal and external displays stay black until you close and open the lid a few times. Then they both work properly.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
Do you have original 85W charger?
Check SMC_LID signal when the screen is black.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
I?m not sure what customer uses.  I do have 85W. 
I only have board and display for this one. I guess SMC_LID won?t work without housing or I could use a magnet somewhere?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
You don't need to trigger lid sensor.
Just check if its signal remains steady high.

Lid sensor is located on J5250, near audio connector.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: Sorry, wrong information. Just got the board in front. It actually doesn't show picture when starting, but it does when lid is closed and opened a couple of times, while Thunderbolt is connected.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
Does it have High Sierra OSX installed?
If yest, test it with El Capitan.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: No internal SSD at the moment. I'm testing with an external drive with High Sierra. Should I install El Capitan on it? How about SMC reset?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
You can try PRAM and SMC reset too.
Don't you have a preinstalled USB pen with El Capitan?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: Not yet, but I do have one drive with it which could be put into external housing.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
SMC_LID 3.42V with display only connected, outside the housing. 

SMC and PRAM no luck.

Do I still have to try El Capitan? I don't see how that would be connected to no image and no backlight. I would be happy with a question mark folder screen.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
Some backlight issues have been reported for High Sierra...
You don't lose anything by trying.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
Sure. I'll go ahead and try.

How about the quesiton mark folder? Should it always be there independent of OSX?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
I tried with El Capitan. Nothing on screen.

Laptop starts with black screen, nothing can be seen using flashlight.

For backlight LCD_BKLT_EN is missing. Goes straight to U9100 (eDP MUX sheet). So something with MUX then since I see HDMI and DP involved on this sheet?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: Any ideas maybe? Board is super clean.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
Do you always get normal image on internal LCD?
The problem appears only when external monitor is connected?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: No. In order to get image on internal display, external has to be connected and lid closed/open a few times. Then it works normal.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
Understood now.
For the repair, continue with internal LCD only.
Check SMC_LID and voltage for pins 28-30 of J9000.
In the first few seconds, you must get 5V there; even without LCD connected.
If LCD is connected, LCD_HPD should go high.
Once LCD is recognized by PCH, all these should stay high and also image/backlight must come on.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: This sounds like U8900 tbh...resolder it.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message:
SMC_LID 3.4V
J9000 no voltage on pins 28-30, with or without screen.

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: Tried to reflow/resolder U8900?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: I ended up reflowing only MUX. Computer works normal so far... I guess marked as solved?

title: 820-3332-A doesn't work properly with external display
message: Run heaven on it at least few hours...
